ComicInfo.Summary:
A young girl named Genie has a dilemma, and she doesn’t know what to do about it while visiting family at the cemetery. Her tears have attracted the attention of Sister Fabula, who seeks to cheer her up with a morbid story. But does Genie really want to hear the tale about a family going out one fine summer at a lake? A summer that would change them forever?
